price: 12. Nummah seehadaytu (Aadam kinnuk) Baaxooxak inkih beyne kallaytuk kaa ginne.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ خَلَقۡنَا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ مِن سُلَٰلَةٖ مِّن طِينٖ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: walaqad khalaqnā al-insāna min sulālatin min ṭīnin
